About Us

Robert Bird Group, member of the Surbana Jurong Group, is a specialist structural, civil and construction engineering consultancy with over 600 employees across offices in Australia, New Zealand, the United Kingdom, the United Arab Emirates and South East Asia. We are dedicated to creating exceptional value for our clients through the intelligent application of engineering science and innovative approaches towards planning for construction.

The cornerstone of our mission is the engagement, collaboration and continuous development of our people. We continually seek highly motivated and skilled individuals to join our team.


People and Career

The cornerstone of our Mission of Good to Great by Design is the engagement, collaboration and continuous development of our people.

RBG continually seeks highly motivated and skilled individuals to join our global team. When you work with us, you will contribute to global projects and work alongside industry specialists. You will have the opportunity to advance and augment your skills, innovate, and build your career.

As an equal opportunity employer, RBG welcomes enthusiastic, skilled individuals who want to work in and contribute to, a professional and respectful work environment.

Diversity

At RBG we excel in a number of diversity based categories such as above industry average participation rates for female engineering staff. While we recognise and celebrate what we do well it is important that we continually challenge and improve our practices to ensure we provide a work environment that engages and energises our employees.

Through our Diversity Committee, we collaborate with our employees to bring about positive change and drive diversity initiatives to benefit all RBG employees. 

Pay Equity Ambassador

RBG are proud to partner with WGEA as Pay Equity Ambassadors. This partnership is due to the commitment RBG have dedicated to providing an equitable salary review process and continuous development of our recruitment and retention strategies throughout the business.
